name: DailyDoodle
0:
”Alexa, open Daily Doodle”
”Alexa, ask Daily Doodle for today's prompt”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily doodle
des: Daily Doodle has a new quick drawing prompt each day. Each doodle is meant to be drawn in 15 minutes or minutes. Each prompt is a short word or phrase you can interpret however you'd like. Use the prompts as a way to improve your drawing ability or simply to get your creativity going.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
